charts.name: openshift-gitops
charts.description: Installs and patches the Red Hat Openshift Gitops Operator

changes.description: Signing Chart
Added customer Health Checks to Argo CD Patch-yaml
changed Argo CD CRD to v1beta1
typo in health check
cleaning up chart, added new README and tried to make more options configurable.
allowing configuration of syncwave for Argo CD object.
updated ArgoCD resource to v1beta1
added ClusterRolebinding to enable cluster-admin permissions for Argo CD in case it is enabled
fixing some default Values
added tpl chart
switching some snippets to use global tpl
it is now possible to define a global AppProject
it is now possible to define the name of a ConfigMap with the list of custom CAs, that will be used inside the Repo Pod
It is now possible to define a sidecar container for Argo CD. This is useful for post-renderer scripts for example.
Added option to define nodeSelector for ArgoCD resource
Added option to configure keycloak as SSO for argo cd
Added possibility to completely enable/disable the sso configuration.
Added possibility to configure oidcConfig for argo cd
Added possibility to define environment variables for the repo-container
Added possibility to define extraConfig settings
Added possibility to define additional labels and annotations for the namespace
Added possibility to define sharding settings for the controller
bump version
fixed default resourceExclusions for Operator openshift-gitops version 1.18.0+
fixed error in the LokiStack resource health check
disabled the gitops-application instance by default
1.1.7 - fixed resource limits and requests for CPU and be sure they are quoted

charts.name: helper-operator
charts.description: A helper Chart to reduce code repetition. This Chart should be called as a dependency by other charts in order to install Operators.

changes.description: Signing Chart
Added Job that will enable Console Plugins if they are defined.
Possibility to configure config.tolerations, config.nodeSelector and config.env for the subscription, updated inline documentation and README
Fix Job _enable_console_plugin_ in a way that it first verifies if the plugin has been added previously already and if it does not exist the Job will add it.
added dependency tp tpl library
switching some snippets to use global tpl
added trustedCA configuration for the Operator
fixed Job _enable_console_plugin_ in a way that it first verifies if the plugin has been added previously already and if it does not exist the Job will add it and leveraging helpers.tpl
added possibility to disable common labels
fixed namespace template to use the correct value for disable_common_labels
1.0.40 - added possibility to configure a custom operatorgroup name
